```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_inputs()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_sidebar()
```

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_100obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

## Column


### Row


::: {.panel-tabset}

### Bar1

```{r basics}
# Bar1
result <- tryCatch({
  viz_bar(
    data = data,
    title = "Bar1",
    color_palette = NULL,
    weight_var = NULL,
    x_var = "region"
  )
}, error = function(e) {
  stop("Visualization failed ('Bar1', type 'bar'): ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)
})

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```


### Scatter1

```{r basics-2}
# Scatter1
result <- tryCatch({
  viz_scatter(
    data = data,
    title = "Scatter1",
    color_palette = NULL,
    x_var = "score",
    y_var = "income"
  )
}, error = function(e) {
  stop("Visualization failed ('Scatter1', type 'scatter'): ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)
})

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```

#### Histogram1

```{r histogram-score}
# Histogram1
result <- tryCatch({
  viz_histogram(
    data = data,
    title = "Histogram1",
    color_palette = NULL,
    weight_var = NULL,
    x_var = "score",
    backend = "plotly"
  )
}, error = function(e) {
  stop("Visualization failed ('Histogram1', type 'histogram'): ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)
})

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```
